document_data.name: Executioner's Eyes
document_data.mainbody: '''''Executioner's eyes''''' was a powerful [[spell]] from the [[divination]] school of magic, used by [[arcane]] spellcasters, [[Demarche]]s of [[Mask]], and [[Lorekeeper]]s of [[Oghma]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, the spell dramatically boosted the targets' vision, giving them insight into the opponents' every vulnerability and every weakness. Creatures affected by the spell were given a boon of improved aim, the damage they could deal, and increased chances of landing especially crippling and devastating blows. The spell affected every friendly creature within the {{SIAdj|15'|'"|long=yes}} radius area and lasted for 60 seconds.
